title: The 2020 Democratic National Convention: Day One | Common & Veronica Chambers
itunes:title: The 2020 Democratic National Convention: Day One | Common & Veronica Chambers
description:
Trevor covers the 2020 Democratic National Convention, Common talks about "Com&Well," and "Finish the Fight!" author Veronica Chambers discusses the U.S. suffrage movement.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
